document_data.mainbody:
Relonar was a drow mage who lived in Ust Natha.
Around 1369 DR, he was part of a sect of Ghaunadaur worshipers who were crushed by Taso Kala. They subsequently fled to the south-east of Ust Natha. Gorions Ward and his party may have been put into service to destroy the sect completely.
